com.example.demo.user.service

Interface UserService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserServiceImpl

    public interface UserService
    Any new methods need to be used by the controller will be first placed here as place holder to be implemented later on

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteUser(long id)
      Deletes an instance of one user based on its unique id

      Gets the list of all users in the database

    • Method Detail

        User saveUser(User user)
        Posts a user into the database
        Parameters:
        user - - instance of a new user being inputted
        Returns:
        - the user that was inputted

      • getAllUsers

        java.util.List<User> getAllUsers()
        Gets the list of all users in the database
        Returns:

      • getUserById

        Gets the information of a specific user
        Parameters:
        id - - the unique id of requested user
        Returns:

      • updateUser

        User updateUser(User user,
                long id)
        Updates a users information by creating a new user and overwriting pre-existing information
        Parameters:
        user - - the new information that needs to be plugged into existing user
        id - - id of existing profile that needs updated
        Returns:
        - updated user instance

      • deleteUser

        void deleteUser(long id)
        Deletes an instance of one user based on its unique id
        Parameters:
